DOC.brief_summary: 20 normal-weight healthy subject ( 10 male , 10 female ) two period give 10 0.5-mL capsules/day fish oil soybean oil 3 week . In end period give standard breakfast ask report appetite visual analogue scale ( VAS ) immediately meal . The result analyze accordance pair design consideration supplement sequence gender .
DOC.detailed_description: In randomized cross-over design , 20 normal-weight healthy subject ( 10 male , 10 female ) give 10 0.5-mL capsules/day fish oil soybean oil 3 week . In end period give standard breakfast ask report appetite visual analogue scale ( VAS ) immediately meal . The result analyze accordance pair design consideration supplement sequence gender .
DOC.criteria: Normal weight ( 18.5 < BMI < 25 kg/m2 ) . Healthy . Subjects take medication could influence appetite . Subjects special nutritional need e.g . pregnant lactating , seriously ill old people . Subjects fish oilsupplements four week prior intervention period .
